articles.description: 'Games wide open' is the motto for this year's Paris Olympics, which officially begin on Friday with the opening ceremony.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Seine, security and familiar faces - French capital prepares for Olympic Games

articles.description: Date, time, order and how to watch on the BBC - here is everything you need to know about the Paris Olympics opening ceremony.
articles.title: Olympics 2024 opening ceremony: Date, time, order & how to watch on BBC

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the day-by-day schedule from the Paris Olympics 2024 for each sport and event including athletics, swimming, football, cycling and more
articles.title: Olympics Schedule - Paris 2024 day-by-day guide of events

articles.description: England host West Indies in the third Test at Edgbaston – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs West Indies LIVE: Third Test, day one, Edgbaston – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: IOC president Thomas Bach says he has "full confidence" in the French authorities after Paris' train network was hit by arson attacks just hours before the Games' opening ceremony.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Thomas Bach has 'full confidence' in French authorities after trains disrupted by 'malicious' fires

articles.description: McLaren's Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri seal a one-two in second practice at the Belgian Grand Prix - with Max Verstappen set for a 10-place grid drop.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri top second practice for McLaren

articles.description: Canada women's football manager Beverly Priestman has been removed as Olympic head coach after the New Zealand Olympic Committee reported that a drone had been flown over their training session on Monday.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Canada suspend Beverly Priestman over drone incident

articles.description: France full-back Melvyn Jaminet is suspended for 34 weeks and fined 30,000 euros (£25,335) by the The French Rugby Federation (FFR) after he posted a racist video on social media.
articles.title: Melvyn Jaminet: France fine and suspend full-back for 34 weeks after racist video

articles.description: Live text commentary from day two of the Test match between Ireland and Zimbabwe at Stormont, Belfast.
articles.title: Men's International Test Match Series: Ireland vs Zimbabwe - Day Two
